verbs.description: carpent (third-person singular simple present carpents, present participle carpenting, simple past and past participle carpented)

entries.meaning: (nonstandard, rare) To do carpentry, or work on (something) as a carpenter.
examples: But no, he looked out at us long. Then shut the Book and strode down the aisle past every half-filled pew. The ones you-know-who carpented - certainly not me. Cracking, they are. Like l told him they would.
